quote: If you try, you might get exactly what you want. If you don't, you don't. – Unknown
fact: The average talker sprays about 300 microscopic saliva droplets per minute, about 2.5 droplets per word.
joke: A man tried to sell me a coffin today. I told him that's the last thing I need.
